ygData.subject: RE: Extremely P.O.'d
ygData.msgSnippet: That is kind of funny, isn t it? But my point is being solicited for items not even on their page From: Daniel P. Sniderman
ygData.messageBody:
That is kind of funny, isn't it?

But my point is being solicited for items not even on their page



From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>



Add to that - the items they are selling are all pretty mediocre and

relatively easy to get. I've GIVEN away Blackened Iron Medallions to

friends and have had one collecting dust in my bank vault for ages...



Slyde

----- Original Message -----

From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>

To: <eqbards@onelist.com>

Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 9:26 AM

Subject: [eqbards] Extremely P.O.'d





> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>

>

> Ok, I am really bloody Mad now. I was contacted In-game by these morons

last

> night, after getting my character back. They seemed to have known about my

> "accident" and then offered to sell me, buy things from me over the net

with

> real money (hackles raise) http://www.global-ent-services.com/eq.htm

>

<snip>





--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------



Was the salesman clueless? Productopia has the answers.
